business_profile.description: Zaio offers accredited tech bootcamps designed to fast-track careers with real-world projects, expert support, and job placement assistance, featuring flexible payment options.

offerings.name: Fullstack Web Development
offerings.description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more. Build dynamic websites and applications.

offerings.name: Data Science
offerings.description: Master Python, machine learning, data analysis, and SQL. Work on real-world data science projects.

offerings.name: Cybersecurity
offerings.description: Master Cybersecurity fundamentals and best practices. Gain in-demand skills.

faqs.question: Do I need any prior coding or tech experience to join a bootcamp?
faqs.answer: No, our bootcamps are designed for beginners!

faqs.question: How do the live classes work?
faqs.answer: We offer live classes twice a weekâ€”once in the morning and once in the evening.

faqs.question: What kind of job support does Zaio offer?
faqs.answer: We offer guaranteed job placement assistance.

faqs.question: How flexible are the payment options?
faqs.answer: We offer multiple payment options to fit your budget.

faqs.question: What happens if I fall behind in the course?
faqs.answer: Our 24/7 tutor support is here to help.

faqs.question: What career outcomes can I expect after completing the bootcamp?
faqs.answer: Zaio graduates have gone on to secure roles as web developers, data scientists, and junior software engineers.

faqs.question: Can I study while working full-time?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our flexible learning options allow you to study while balancing a full-time job.
